may also be modified to reflect stronger prior knowledge of the relationship between cases from week-to-week, which controls the smoothness of the epidemic curve. Increasing the shape parameter with a more informative prior, e.g. Gamma(10,0.1), can force the differences in cases from week-to-week to be small, resulting in a smoother epidemic curve and mitigating large fluctuations in estimates.
